text: Chip McKibben (born June 23, 1965) is an American rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:American male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the United States Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Escondido, California Category:Pan American Games medalists in rowing Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for the United States Category:Rowers at the 1995 Pan American Games
title: Chip McKibben
